pages.text: $(thing)Logistics Frames/$ are attachable gadgets which are placed onto inventories or tanks to mark them as part of a $(thing)Logistics System/$.$(p)Frames can be configured by $(thing)right-clicking/$ with a $(l:tools/logistics_configurator)Logistics Configurator/$, or removed by $(thing)sneak+right-clicking/$ with the Configurator.

All Frames support $(thing)filtering/$ to control what items/fluids they will provide or accept.$(p)In addition, you can specify whether filters match by $(thing)item metadata/$ or $(thing)item NBT/$.$(p)Finally, frames can be configured to be $(thing)invisible/$ to players unless they are holding a Logistics item (frame or configurator).

pages.title: Active Provider Frame
pages.text: The $(item)Active Provider Frame/$ provides items/fluids to $(l:logistics/frames#requester)Requester Frames/$, $(l:logistics/frames#storage)Storage Frames/$ and $(l:logistics/frames#default_storage)Default Storage Frames/$.

pages.title: Passive Provider Frame
pages.text: The $(item)Passive Provider Frame/$ provides items/fluids to $(l:logistics/frames#requester)Requester Frames/$.

pages.title: Storage Frame
pages.text: $(item)Storage Frames/$ can receive items/fluids from $(l:logistics/frames#active_provider)Active Provider Frames/$ and supply items to $(l:logistics/frames#requester)Requester Frames/$.

pages.title: Default Storage Frame
pages.text: $(item)Default Storage Frames/$ can receive items/fluids from $(l:logistics/frames#active_provider)Active Provider Frames/$ and supply resources to $(l:logistics/frames#requester)Requester Frames/$ and $(l:logistics/frames#storage)Storage Frames/$. They have a lower priority than Storage Frames, which will be always be used first if possible.

pages.title: Requester Frame
pages.text: $(item)Requester Frames/$ can request items/fluids from any other framed inventory. Use the configuration GUI to tell the frame how much of each item or fluid to try to keep stocked.
